<DOCUMENT>
<TYPE>EX-10.20
<SEQUENCE>2
<FILENAME>dex1020.htm
<DESCRIPTION>AMENDMENT NO. 1 TO 2006 DIRECTOR RESTRICTED STOCK PLAN
<TEXT>
<HTML><HEAD>
<TITLE>Amendment No. 1 to 2006 Director Restricted Stock Plan</TITLE>
</HEAD>
 <BODY BGCOLOR="WHITE">


 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="right"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Exhibit 10.20 </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="right">

<IMG SRC="g31599logo.jpg" ALT="LOGO"> </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>AMENDMENT NO. 1 </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>TO THE </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>WILLBROS GROUP, INC. </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"
ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>2006 DIRECTOR RESTRICTED STOCK PLAN </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">1. <B><U>Introduction</U>.</B> On
June&nbsp;14, 2006, the Board of Directors of W<SMALL>ILLBROS</SMALL> G<SMALL>ROUP</SMALL>, I<SMALL>NC</SMALL>. (the &#147;Corporation&#148;) adopted, and on August&nbsp;2, 2006, the stockholders of the Corporation approved, the Willbros Group, Inc.
2006 Director Restricted Stock Plan (the &#147;Plan&#148;). The Plan provides for the award of Shares of Restricted Stock to Eligible Directors. Terms used in this Amendment to the Plan and not defined herein shall have the meanings ascribed to such
terms in the Plan. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">2. <B><U>Purpose</U>.</B> The Corporation contemplates that it may recruit persons to serve on the Board who are not
citizens or residents of the United States and for whom awards of Shares of Restricted Stock may not be as beneficial as such awards are to persons who are citizens or residents of the United States. The purpose of this Amendment is to permit the
award of Restricted Stock Rights under the Plan to facilitate the Corporation&#146;s ability to recruit and retain qualified persons who are not United States citizens or residents to serve on the Board. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">3. <B><U>Amendments</U>.</B> </FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(a)</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">The following definitions appearing in Section&nbsp;2 (Definitions) of the Plan shall be amended and restated in their entirety to read as follows: </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P
STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="8%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147; &#145;Award&#146; means an award of Shares of Restricted Stock or of RSRs to an Eligible Director hereunder.&#148; </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P
STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="8%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147; &#145;Eligible Director&#146; or &#145;Participant&#146; means each member of the Board who, on the date on which a Restricted Stock Award or RSR Award is made to him or her
under Section&nbsp;6 hereof, is not a salaried officer or employee of the Corporation or any of the Subsidiaries.&#148; </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(b)</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">The following new definitions shall be inserted in their respective alphabetically appropriate places in Section&nbsp;2 (Definitions) of the Plan: </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P
STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="8%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147; &#145;Non-U.S. Eligible Director&#146; means an Eligible Director who is not a citizen or resident of the United States.&#148; </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P
STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="8%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147; &#145;RSR&#146; (Restricted Stock Right) means the right to receive, upon vesting of the RSR, a Share, which RSR is granted pursuant to, and subject to the terms of Sections
6 and 7, and is subject to such additional terms and restrictions as are set forth in the relevant Award Agreement.&#148; </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="8%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147; &#145;U.S. Eligible Director&#146; means an Eligible Director who is a citizen or resident of the United States.&#148; </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P
STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(c)</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">The final sentence of Section&nbsp;3 shall be amended to read in its entirety as follows: </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;For purposes of the Plan, if Shares of Restricted Stock or RSRs are forfeited, the forfeited Shares of Restricted Stock or the Shares reserved for issuance upon the vesting of the forfeited RSRs shall again be
available for issuance under the Plan.&#148; </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>

<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">



<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(d)</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Section&nbsp;5 shall be amended to read in its entirety as follows: </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="8%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;5. <B>Eligibility.</B> Each Eligible Director shall be eligible to participate under the Plan; <I>provided, however</I>, any Eligible Director may decline an Award which would
otherwise be awarded hereunder.&#148; </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(e)</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Section&nbsp;6 shall be amended to read in its entirety as follows: </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="8%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;6. <B>Restricted Stock and RSR Awards.</B> Without further action by the Board or the stockholders of the Corporation, each U.S. Eligible Director shall be automatically
awarded Shares of Restricted Stock and each Non-U.S. Eligible Director shall be awarded RSRs under the Plan, as follows: </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:13%; text-indent:4%"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(a) <B>Initial Award</B>. On the Initial Award Date, each Eligible Director shall be awarded that number of Shares of Restricted Stock or RSRs determined by dividing $30,000 by the Fair Market Value on the date of the
Award, or if such day is not a trading day on the NYSE, on the immediately preceding trading day. The number of Shares or RSRs so determined shall be rounded to the nearest number of whole Shares or RSRs (subject to adjustment as provided in
Section&nbsp;9). Except as otherwise provided herein, the Shares or RSRs subject to an Initial Award shall vest on the first anniversary of the date of the Award. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:13%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(b) <B>Annual Awards</B>. On the second Monday in January of each year on which an Eligible Director continues to be an Eligible
Director, such Eligible Director shall be awarded that number of Shares of Restricted Stock or RSRs determined by dividing $30,000 by the Fair Market Value on the date of the Award, or if such day is not a trading day on the NYSE, on the immediately
preceding trading day. The number of Shares or RSRs so determined shall be rounded to the nearest number of whole Shares or RSRs (subject to adjustment as provided in Section&nbsp;9). Except as otherwise provided herein, the Shares or RSRs subject
to an Annual Award shall vest on the first anniversary of the date of the Award.&#148; </FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(f)</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Section&nbsp;7 shall be amended to read in its entirety as follows: </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="8%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;7. <B>Limitations on Restricted Stock and RSRs.</B> </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:13%; text-indent:4%"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(a) Shares of Restricted Stock and RSRs shall not be sold, assigned, transferred or otherwise disposed of, mortgaged, pledged or otherwise encumbered until such Shares of Restricted Stock or RSRs have vested pursuant
to the Plan. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:13%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(b) Except as provided in this Section&nbsp;7, (i)&nbsp;U.S. Eligible Directors shall have, with respect to
their Shares of Restricted Stock, all of the rights of a stockholder of the Corporation holding the Shares, including the right to vote the Shares and the right to receive any dividends paid thereon, and (ii)&nbsp;Non-U.S. Eligible Directors shall
receive an amount in cash equivalent to the amount or value of the dividends that would be paid on the Shares that are issuable upon the vesting of RSRs held by a Non-U.S. Eligible Director when dividends are paid on Shares, but shall have no right
to vote the Shares issuable upon the vesting of RSRs held by the Non-U.S. Eligible Director. Any dividends or distributions that are paid or made in Shares shall be subject to the same restrictions as the Shares of Restricted Stock in respect of
which such dividends or distributions were paid or made. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:13%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(c) Shares of Restricted Stock shall be issued in such form as
the Board may deem appropriate, including book-entry registration or issuance of one or more stock certificates. Any stock certificate issued in respect of Shares of Restricted Stock shall be </FONT>
</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">2 </FONT></P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">


 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:13%">
<FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">registered in the name of the Participant and shall bear an appropriate legend referring to the terms, conditions, and restrictions applicable to such Award,
substantially in the following form: </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:17%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;The transferability of this certificate and the shares of stock represented hereby are subject
to the terms and conditions (including forfeiture) of the Willbros Group, Inc. 2006 Director Restricted Stock Plan and an Award Agreement. Copies of such Plan and Award Agreement are on file at the headquarters offices of Willbros Group, Inc.&#148;
</FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="8%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">The Board may require that the certificates evidencing such Shares be held in custody by the Corporation until the restrictions thereon shall have lapsed and that, as a condition of
any such Award, the Participant shall have delivered a stock power, endorsed in blank, relating to the Shares covered by such Award. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="8%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">The terms of each Award shall be set forth in an Award Agreement between the Corporation and the Participant, which Award Agreement shall contain such provisions as the Board
determines to be necessary or appropriate to carry out the intent of the Plan. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:13%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(d) Shares of Restricted
Stock and RSRs shall vest in accordance with the terms of the Plan; provided, however, that Shares of Restricted Stock and RSRs shall vest with respect to 100% of such Shares or RSRs upon the termination of the Participant&#146;s service as a member
of the Board by reason of death, Disability or Retirement. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:13%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(e) In the event of the termination of service of a
Participant as a member of the Board other than by reason of death, Disability or Retirement, the Participant shall forfeit the Shares of Restricted Stock or RSRs which are not vested as of the date of termination. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:13%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(f) Upon the occurrence of a Change in Control, all Shares of Restricted Stock and all RSRs awarded under the Plan and not previously
forfeited shall immediately become fully vested.&#148; </FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(g)</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Section&nbsp;8 shall be amended to read in its entirety as follows: </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="8%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;8. <B>Other Provisions; Securities Registration.</B> The award of Shares of Restricted Stock or RSRs under the Plan may also be subject to such other provisions as counsel to
the Corporation deems appropriate, including without limitation, provisions imposing restrictions on resale or other disposition of the Shares or RSRs and such provisions as may be appropriate to comply with applicable securities laws and stock
exchange requirements. The Corporation shall not be required to deliver any certificate for Shares of Restricted Stock awarded under the Plan or Shares issuable upon the vesting of RSRs prior to the admission of such Shares to listing on any stock
exchange on which Common Stock at that time may be listed. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="8%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">All certificates for Shares of Restricted Stock delivered under the terms of the Plan or Shares issuable upon the vesting of RSRs shall be subject to such stop-transfer orders and
other restrictions as counsel to the Corporation may deem advisable under applicable securities laws, rules and regulations thereunder, and the rules of any stock exchange on which Common Stock may be listed. The Corporation may cause a legend or
legends to be placed on any such certificates to make appropriate reference to such restrictions or any other restrictions or limitations that may be applicable to such Shares.&#148; </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">3 </FONT></P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">



<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(h)</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Section&nbsp;9 shall be amended to read in its entirety as follows: </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="8%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;9. <B>Adjustments.</B> </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:13%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(a)
<B>Corporate Transactions and Events</B>. In the event any recapitalization, reorganization, merger, consolidation, spin-off, combination, repurchase, exchange of Shares or other securities of the Corporation, stock split or reverse split,
extraordinary dividend (whether in the form of cash, Shares, or other property), liquidation, dissolution, or other similar corporate transaction or event affects the Shares such that an adjustment is appropriate in order to prevent dilution or
enlargement of each Participant&#146;s rights under the Plan, then an adjustment shall be made, in a manner that is proportionate to the change to the Shares and otherwise equitable, in (i)&nbsp;the number and kind of Shares reserved and available
for issuance under Section&nbsp;3, and (ii)&nbsp;the number and kind of Shares subject or to be subject to each automatic award of Shares of Restricted Stock or RSRs under Section&nbsp;6. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:13%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(b) <B>Insufficient Number of Shares</B>. If at any date an insufficient number of Shares are available under the Plan for the automatic
award of Shares of Restricted Stock and RSRs (including the satisfaction of Shares issuable on the vesting of RSRs) made at that date, Awards under Section&nbsp;6 shall be automatically awarded proportionately to each Eligible Director, to the
extent Shares are then available and otherwise as provided under Section&nbsp;6. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:13%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(c) <B>Notice of Adjustment</B>. Upon
the occurrence of each event for which an adjustment with respect to an Award has been made as provided in this Section&nbsp;9, the Corporation shall mail forthwith to each Participant a copy of its computation of such adjustment which shall be
conclusive and binding upon each Participant.&#148; </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">4. <B><U>No Change</U>.</B> Except as specifically set forth herein, this Amendment
does not change the terms of the Plan. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">5. <B><U>Effective Date</U>.</B> This Amendment shall take effect and be adopted as of
January&nbsp;9, 2007. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px;padding-bottom:3px;line-height:95%; vertical-align:top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Executed as of the 9</FONT><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="1"
COLOR="#000000"><SUP>th</SUP></FONT><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2" COLOR="#000000"> day of January 2007. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" ALIGN="center">

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="right"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Exhibit 10.40 </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>SHARE PURCHASE AGREEMENT </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Between </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"

STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>And </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>ASCOT OFFSHORE NIGERIA LIMITED

<TD VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE="margin-left:4.00em; text-indent:-1.00em"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">7.2&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></P></TD>

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">i </FONT></P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">


 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">EXHIBITS:* </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman"
SIZE="2">A - Intellectual Property License Agreement </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">B - Transition Services Agreement </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">SCHEDULES:* </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Disclosure Schedule </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Schedule 4.2 - Purchaser&#146;s Consents </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman"
SIZE="2">*Omitted. The Company agrees to furnish supplementally a copy of any omitted exhibit, schedule or similar attachment to the Securities and Exchange Commission upon its request. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT
SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">ii </FONT></P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">


 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>SHARE PURCHASE AGREEMENT </B></FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>This Share Purchase Agreement</B> (this &#147;<B>Agreement</B>&#148;) is made and entered into as of the 7th day of February, 2007, by and between
Willbros Group, Inc., a corporation organized under the laws of the Republic of Panama (&#147;<B>Seller</B>&#148;); and Ascot Offshore Nigeria Limited, a company organized under the laws of the Federal Republic of Nigeria
(&#147;<B>Purchaser</B>&#148;). </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:24px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>WITNESSETH </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>WHEREAS</B>, Seller owns all of the issued and outstanding share capital of WG Nigeria Holdings Limited, a company organized under the laws of the Cayman Islands (the &#147;<B>Company</B>&#148;), which is engaged
in the Business as defined below; and </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>WHEREAS</B>, Purchaser desires to acquire, and Seller desires to sell, said share capital of the
Company; and </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>WHEREAS</B>, Purchaser and Seller (the &#147;<B>Parties</B>&#148;) desire to evidence their agreement to the terms and
conditions of the purchase and sale of said share capital of the Company as set forth in this Agreement; </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>NOW</B>, <B>THEREFORE</B>, in
consideration of the premises and the representations, warranties, and mutual covenants hereinafter set forth, and other good and valuable consideration the receipt and sufficiency of which are hereby acknowledged, the Parties hereby agree as
follows: </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:24px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>ARTICLE I </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman"
SIZE="2"><B>DEFINITIONS </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">1.1 <B>Defined Terms.</B> For purposes of this Agreement and any Exhibit or Schedule to this Agreement, each
of the following terms shall have the following meanings: </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<B>Affiliate</B>&#148; means, with respect to any Person, each other
Person that directly or indirectly (through one or more intermediaries or otherwise) controls, is controlled by, or is under common control with such Person. The term &#147;<B>control</B>&#148; (including the terms &#147;<B>controlled by</B>&#148;
and &#147;<B>under common control with</B>&#148;) means the possession, directly or indirectly, of the actual power to direct or cause the direction of the management policies of a Person, whether through the ownership of stock, by contract, credit
arrangement or otherwise. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<B>Agreement</B>&#148; means this Share Purchase Agreement, as amended, supplemented or modified from time
to time in accordance with the express terms hereof. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<B>Balance Sheet Date</B>&#148; means September&nbsp;30, 2006. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<B>Basket</B>&#148; has the meaning specified in Section&nbsp;6.3(b). </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT
SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">1 </FONT></P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">


 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<B>Business</B>&#148; means the engineering, procurement, construction and other support services
for onshore, coastal and offshore locations provided by the Subsidiaries in relation to Nigeria primarily, but also temporarily now in Togo, Benin and Ghana; the Business being described with more particularity in the SEC Filings. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<B>Claim</B>&#148; means a claim for indemnification under Section&nbsp;6.1. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<B>Closing</B>&#148; means the consummation of the purchase and sale of the Shares contemplated by this Agreement. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<B>Closing Balance Sheet</B>&#148; means the combined balance sheet of the Company and the Subsidiaries as of the Closing Date, prepared in
accordance with GAAP. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<B>Closing Date</B>&#148; has the meaning specified in Section&nbsp;3.1. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<B>Closing Purchase Price</B>&#148; means U.S.$155,250,000 </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<B>Company</B>&#148; has the meaning specified in the first preamble to this Agreement. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman"
SIZE="2">&#147;<B>Company Contracts</B>&#148; means all of the following to which the Company or any of the Subsidiaries is a party, or by which the Company or any of the Subsidiaries is bound, or by which any property or assets owned, used or held
for use by the Company or any of the Subsidiaries may be bound: (i)&nbsp;any lease of tangible personal property having rentals in excess of U.S.$500,000, in the aggregate, due over the remaining term of the lease; (ii)&nbsp;any construction,
engineering, EPC or similar contract pursuant to which the Company or any of the Subsidiaries provides services, intellectual property, materials or other goods under which a client is expected to pay to the Company or any of the Subsidiaries an
aggregate amount in excess of U.S.$500,000, during any six-month period following the Closing Date; (iii)&nbsp;any procurement contract or other similar contract or agreement pursuant to which the Company or any of the Subsidiaries is obligated to
purchase in excess of U.S.$500,000, in the aggregate, in products or services; (iv)&nbsp;any contract, agreement, arrangement or commitment which materially restricts the conduct of any line of business of the Company or any of the Subsidiaries;
(v)&nbsp;any contract or agreement with or benefiting any director or officer of the Company or any of the Subsidiaries, exclusive of salary and payments under a Company Employee Benefit Plan; (vi)&nbsp;any agreement, indenture or other instrument
relating to the borrowing of money by the Company or any of the Subsidiaries; (vii)&nbsp;any agreement pursuant to which the Company or any of the Subsidiaries is obligated to lend money or make advances to any person (other than routine employee
advances in the ordinary course of business); (viii)&nbsp;any agreement, arrangement or commitment of the Company or any of the Subsidiaries to guarantee the obligations of or to indemnify or exonerate from liability any Person, including any
director or officer of the Company or any of the Subsidiaries (other than pursuant to applicable law or the Organizational Documents of the Company or any of the Subsidiaries); (ix)&nbsp;any agreement or arrangement relating to the voting or
disposition of any securities of the Company or any of the Subsidiaries; (x)&nbsp;any other contract, commitment or agreement which involves more than U.S.$500,000, in aggregate consideration; (xi)&nbsp;any partnership, joint venture or other
agreement pursuant to which the Company or any of the Subsidiaries holds an equity interest in any Person; and (xii)&nbsp;any amendment, supplement and </FONT>
</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">2 </FONT></P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">


 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">
<FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">modification, oral or written, of any of the foregoing; provided, however, that the foregoing definition of &#147;<B>Company Contracts</B>&#148; shall not
include any Company Employee Benefit Plan. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<B>Company Employee Benefit Plans</B>&#148; means any pension, gratuity schemes,
provident fund schemes, the Nigerian National Housing Fund Scheme and the Nigerian National Social Insurance Trust Fund Scheme, profit sharing, severance pay, sick leave, vacation pay, salary continuation for disability, retirement, deferred
compensation, bonus, long-term incentive, hospitalization, medical insurance or life insurance program or plan maintained by the Company or any of the Subsidiaries or to which the Company or any of the Subsidiaries has contributed or is obligated to
contribute or in which any employee of the Company or any of the Subsidiaries participates. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<B>Company Financial
Statements</B>&#148; has the meaning specified in Section&nbsp;4.1(j). </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<B>Company Permits</B>&#148; means the permits, licenses,
orders, franchises, approvals and authorizations of all Governmental Authorities necessary for the lawful conduct of the Business or the lawful ownership, use and operation of the assets of the Company or any of the Subsidiaries. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<B>Confidentiality Agreement</B>&#148; means the letter agreement dated September&nbsp;13, 2006, between Purchaser and Seller relating to the
furnishing of information to Purchaser in connection with Purchaser&#146;s evaluation of the possibility of the transaction contemplated in this Agreement. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<B>Current Assets</B>&#148; means the current assets reflected on the combined balance sheet of the Company and the Subsidiaries at any given date, determined in accordance with GAAP. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<B>Current Liabilities</B>&#148; means the current liabilities reflected on the combined balance sheet of the Company and the Subsidiaries at any
given date, determined in accordance with GAAP. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<B>Damages</B>&#148; has the meaning specified in Section&nbsp;6.1. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<B>Data Room Documentation</B>&#148; means all documents, information and matters referred to and posted on Seller&#146;s secure website at
<U>https://services.intralinks.com</U> as of the Closing Date.&nbsp;Purchaser acknowledges that it has received permission from Seller to access the secure website and&nbsp;all such documents and matters. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<B>Deposit</B>&#148; has the meaning specified in Section&nbsp;2.2(a). </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<B>Disclosure Schedule</B>&#148; means: (i)&nbsp;the <B>Disclosure Schedule</B> attached hereto, (ii)&nbsp;any documents referred to on such
<B>Disclosure Schedule</B>, (iii)&nbsp;any document or matter referred to in the SEC Filings, (iv)&nbsp;any Data Room Documentation, and (v)&nbsp;any Due Diligence Documentation, all of which shall be deemed to be incorporated by reference in the
<B>Disclosure Schedule</B> and thereby disclosed to Purchaser. A disclosure made under any Section of the <B>Disclosure Schedule</B> shall be deemed to be a disclosure under all Sections of the <B>Disclosure Schedule</B>. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">3 </FONT></P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">


 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<B>Dispute</B>&#148; has the meaning specified in Section&nbsp;7.10(a). </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<B>Due Diligence Documentation</B>&#148; means all documents, information and matters&nbsp;provided&nbsp;by Seller to Purchaser and its advisors
during meetings between the Parties, whether such meetings&nbsp;took place in the Federal Republic of Nigeria, Ghana, the United Kingdom, the United States of America or any other location. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<B>Effective Time</B>&#148; means the opening of business on the Closing Date. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<B>Environmental Law</B>&#148; means any applicable statute, code, ordinance, rule, regulation, policy, license, judgment, order, writ, decree,
injunction or other authorization in effect on the date hereof or at a previous time in any of the Relevant Countries relating to (a)&nbsp;emissions, discharges or releases of Hazardous Materials into the natural environment, including into ambient
air, soil, sediments, land surface or subsurface, buildings or facilities, surface water, groundwater or land; or (b)&nbsp;otherwise relating to the pollution of, or damage to, the environment. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<B>EPC</B>&#148; means engineering, procurement and construction. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<B>FCPA</B>&#148; has the meaning specified in Section&nbsp;5.5. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<B>Frontier</B>&#148; has the
meaning specified in Section&nbsp;4.3. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<B>GAAP</B>&#148; means generally accepted accounting principles, as recognized by the U.S.
Financial Accounting Standards Board (or any generally recognized successor), as practiced by Seller, consistently applied. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman"
SIZE="2">&#147;<B>Governmental Action</B>&#148; means any authorization, application, approval, consent, exemption, filing, license, notice, registration, permit or other requirement of, to or with any Governmental Authority. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<B>Governmental Authority</B>&#148; means any national, state, county or municipal government or any agency, board, bureau, commission, court,
department or other instrumentality of any such government in any of the Relevant Countries. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<B>Guaranty</B>&#148; has the meaning
specified in Section&nbsp;2.2(b). </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<B>Hazardous Material</B>&#148; means (a)&nbsp;any hazardous substance, hazardous waste or solid
waste, in each case as defined by applicable Environmental Law; or (b)&nbsp;any solid, hazardous, dangerous or toxic chemical, material, waste or substance, within the meaning of and regulated by any applicable Environmental Law. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<B>Hebert</B>&#148; has the meaning specified in Section&nbsp;4.3. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<B>Indemnified Person</B>&#148; has the meaning specified in Section&nbsp;6.1. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<B>Indemnifying
Party</B>&#148; has the meaning specified in Section&nbsp;6.1. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">4 </FONT></P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">


 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<B>Independent Accounting Firm</B>&#148; means Deloitte Touche Tohmatsu or another mutually agreed
independent accounting firm. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>&#147;Intellectual Property License Agreement</B>&#148;<B></B> means an agreement to be entered into at
the Closing between Purchaser and Seller, substantially in the form set forth as <B>Exhibit A,</B> providing for the Seller&#146;s license to Purchaser of Purchaser&#146;s use of the &#147;Willbros&#148; name and trademark in certain territory.
</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<B>Investigations</B>&#148; means the ongoing investigations by the U.S. Department of Justice, the SEC and the Office of Foreign
Assets Control of the U.S. Department of the Treasury into the actions of certain former employees of subsidiaries of Seller in connection with the Business, being described with more particularity in the SEC Filings. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<B>JPMorgan</B>&#148; has the meaning specified in Section&nbsp;4.3. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<B>Knowledge</B>&#148; (whether or not capitalized) means (a)&nbsp;with respect to a natural Person, the actual knowledge of that Person, and (b)&nbsp;with respect to a Person which is a business entity, the
actual knowledge of each of the current senior management employees (rank of Senior Vice President or General Manager and above) of such entity. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman"
SIZE="2">&#147;<B>LCIA</B>&#148; has the meaning specified in Section&nbsp;7.10(c). </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<B>LIBOR</B>&#148; means </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(a)</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">the applicable Screen Rate, or </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(b)</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">if no Screen Rate is available for U.S. Dollars for the relevant period, the arithmetic mean of the rates (rounded upwards to four decimal places) supplied by the Reference Banks to
leading banks in the London interbank market, </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">at 11:00 a.m. (London time) on the day which is two business days before the first day of the
relevant period. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<B>Lien</B>&#148; means any lien, mortgage, security interest, pledge, deposit, restriction, burden, encumbrance or
other arrangement substantially equivalent thereto. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<B>Material Adverse Effect</B>&#148; means (a)&nbsp;when used with respect to
the Company, a result or consequence that would materially adversely affect the financial condition, results of operations or business of the Company and the Subsidiaries (taken as a whole) or the aggregate value of their assets, or would materially
impair the ability of the Company and the Subsidiaries (taken as a whole) to own, hold, develop and operate their assets; (b)&nbsp;when used with respect to Purchaser, a result or consequence that would materially adversely affect the condition
(financial or otherwise), results of operations or business of Purchaser and its subsidiaries (taken as a whole) or the aggregate value of their assets, would materially impair the ability of Purchaser to own, hold, develop and operate its assets,
or would impair Purchaser&#146;s ability to perform its </FONT>
</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">5 </FONT></P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">


 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">
<FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">obligations hereunder or consummate the transaction contemplated hereby; and (c)&nbsp;when used with respect to Seller, a result or consequence that would
materially adversely affect the condition (financial or otherwise), results of operations or business of Seller and its subsidiaries (taken as a whole) or the aggregate value of their assets, would materially impair the ability of Seller to own,
hold, develop and operate its assets, or would impair Seller&#146;s ability to perform its obligations hereunder or consummate the transaction contemplated hereby. An impact equivalent in value to 10 percent of the Purchase Price shall be deemed
sufficient (but not necessary) to be materially adverse for the purposes hereof. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<B>Note</B>&#148; has the meaning specified in
Section&nbsp;2.2(b). </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<B>Organizational Documents</B>&#148; means, as applicable, the Certificate or Articles of Incorporation,
Bylaws, Memorandum and Articles of Association and similar documents that govern the organization of any entity. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman"
SIZE="2">&#147;<B>Parties</B>&#148; has the meaning specified in the third preamble to this Agreement. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<B>Permitted Liens</B>&#148;
means (a)&nbsp;Liens for Taxes, assessments or other governmental charges or levies if the same are not at the particular time in question due and delinquent or are being contested in good faith by appropriate proceedings; (b)&nbsp;Liens of
carriers, warehousemen, mechanics, laborers, materialmen, landlords, vendors, workmen and operators arising by operation of law in the ordinary course of business or by a written agreement existing as of the date hereof for sums not yet due or being
contested in good faith by appropriate proceedings; (c)&nbsp;Liens incurred in the ordinary course of business in connection with workers&#146; compensation, unemployment insurance and other social security legislation which would not, individually
or in the aggregate, result in a Material Adverse Effect on the Company; (d)&nbsp;Liens incurred in the ordinary course of business to secure the performance of bids, tenders, trade contracts, leases, statutory obligations, surety and appeal bonds,
performance and repayment bonds and other obligations of a like nature; (e)&nbsp;Liens, easements, rights-of-way, restrictions, servitudes, permits, conditions, covenants, exceptions, reservations and other similar encumbrances incurred in the
ordinary course of business or existing on property and not materially impairing the value of the assets of the Company and the Subsidiaries (taken as a whole) or interfering with the ordinary conduct of the Business; and (f)&nbsp;any defects,
irregularities or deficiencies in title to real estate interests that are of record and do not materially adversely affect either the operations or the value of the assets of the Company and the Subsidiaries (taken as a whole). </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<B>Person</B>&#148; (whether or not capitalized) means any natural person, corporation, company, limited or general partnership, joint stock
company, joint venture, association, limited liability company, trust, bank, trust company, business trust or other entity or organization, whether or not a Governmental Authority. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<B>Pledge Agreement</B>&#148; has the meaning specified in Section&nbsp;2.2(b). </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<B>Purchase Price</B>&#148; means the Closing Purchase Price as adjusted pursuant to Section&nbsp;2.3. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<B>Purchaser</B>&#148; has the meaning specified in the introductory paragraph of this Agreement. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">6 </FONT></P>

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<B>Purchaser Claims</B>&#148; has the meaning specified in Section&nbsp;6.3(b). </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<B>Purchaser Representative</B>&#148; means any director, officer, employee, agent, advisor (including legal, accounting and financial advisors),
Affiliate or other representative or agent authorized to act on behalf of Purchaser. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<B>Reference Banks</B>&#148; means HSBC Plc,
Barclays Bank Plc and the Royal Bank of Scotland Plc. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<B>Reference Rate</B>&#148; means LIBOR. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<B>Related Persons</B>&#148; (whether or not capitalized) has the meaning specified in Section&nbsp;6.1. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<B>Relevant Countries</B>&#148; means the U.S.A., the Cayman Islands, Panama, Nigeria, Ghana, Togo and Benin. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<B>Resolution Period</B>&#148; has the meaning specified in Section&nbsp;2.3(b). </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<B>Responsible Officer</B>&#148; means, with respect to either Party, the Chairman, the Chief Executive Officer, the President, the Chief Operating
Officer, the Chief Financial Officer or any Vice President of such Party. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<B>Screen Rate</B>&#148; means the British Bankers&#146;
Association Interest Settlement Rate for U.S. Dollars for the relevant period, displayed on page 3750 of the Telerate screen, or the equivalent page of the Reuters service if the Telerate system is no longer available. If the agreed page is replaced
or service ceases to be available, the average of alternative pages or services, one chosen by each Party, displaying the appropriate rate shall apply. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<B>SEC</B>&#148; means the Securities and Exchange Commission of the United States of America. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman"
SIZE="2">&#147;<B>SEC Filings</B>&#148; means Seller&#146;s 2004 Annual Report on Form 10-K and 2005 Annual Report on Form 10-K and Seller&#146;s Quarterly Reports on Form 10-Q for the periods ended March&nbsp;31, 2006,&nbsp;June&nbsp;30, 2006, and
September&nbsp;30, 2006, filed with the SEC and available for review on Seller&#146;s website at http://www.willbros.com. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman"
SIZE="2">&#147;<B>Seller</B>&#148; has the meaning specified in the introductory paragraph of this Agreement. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<B>Seller
Representative</B>&#148; means any director, officer, employee, agent, advisor (including legal, accounting and financial advisors), Affiliate or other representative or agent authorized to act on behalf of Seller. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<B>Shares</B>&#148; means 93,771,000 shares of the ordinary share capital, par value U.S.$1.00 per share, of the Company. </FONT></P> <P

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<B>Subsidiaries</B>&#148; means WG Nigeria Equipment Limited, a company organized under the laws of
the Cayman Islands (&#147;<B>WGNEL</B>&#148;), Willbros West Africa, Inc., a corporation organized under the laws of the Republic of Panama (&#147;<B>WWAI</B>&#148;), Willbros (Nigeria) Limited, a company organized under the laws of the Federal
Republic of Nigeria (&#147;<B>WNL</B>&#148;), and Willbros (Offshore) Nigeria Limited, a company organized under the laws of the Federal Republic of Nigeria (&#147;<B>WONL</B>&#148;). </FONT></P> <P
